revised_title: Discovery of Parkeria and Loftusia: Gigantic Arenaceous Foraminifera
tldr: The authors describe two gigantic types of arenaceous foraminifera, Parkeria and Loftusia, found in Upper Greensand near Cambridge and in Persia. These unique organisms have a structure that deviates from previously known foraminiferal types, and their classification remains provisional. Further research may reveal more varieties of arenaceous foraminifera and help elucidate the relationships between these anomalous forms and other known types.
